channel.description: Recent content in OSINT on Jett's blog

item.title: TIL: How shodan takes screenshots of computers
item.description: Recently, I have been playing around with shodan images, a service provided by shodan that aggregates screenshots of accesible videofeeds over the internet of things, including a lot of windows login screens and webcams. The catch is, while they provide the screenshot for the users, shodan provides absolutely no hints as of how they obtained the screenshot. Shodan claims that they grabbed those screenshots based as the RDP service is exposed to the internet, but when I tried to access the remote desktops with Microsoft Remote Desktop, it immediately prompted me for a username and password, which I do not have.
